original_text: I will be like a shepherd who looks everywhere to find his lost sheep. I will find them and I will rescue them. I will bring them back from the places that they have run away to. It was a dark day with many clouds when they ran away.
korean_text: 목자가 양 가운데에 있는 날에 양이 흩어졌으면 그 떼를 찾는 것 같이 내가 내 양을 찾아서 흐리고 캄캄한 날에 그 흩어진 모든 곳에서 그것들을 건져낼지라

sentences.original_text: I will be like a shepherd
who looks everywhere to find his lost sheep
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 잃어버린 양들을 찾기 위해 곳곳을 찾아보는

sentences.original_text: from the places that they have run away to
It was a dark day with many clouds
